data.actual_result: The text goes below the number.
data.expected_result: Like on desktop, the text doesn't go below the number. It starts after the hyphen instead.
data.short_description: The text after expanding an entry in the Audit log goes below the number.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make changes to a long channel name (or do anything that gives a long entry in the log). - Open Audit logs. - Expand the message that talks about your changes. - Observe that the text goes below the number.
